The sun cast a warm golden glow over the lush forests of the Indian kingdom of Maharastra. You, a skilled hunter named Raj, are on a quest to track down a legendary creature that has been terrorizing the local villages. As you make your way through the thick undergrowth, you hear the sound of rustling leaves and snapping twigs nearby. Your heart races with excitement as you realize you are close to your target.

Suddenly, a massive creature bursts from the bushes in front of you. Its scales glisten in the sunlight and its eyes glow with an otherworldly light. This is the beast you have been hunting - the Naga, a serpent-like creature said to have the power to control the elements.

What do you do?
1. Draw your bow and arrow to attack the Naga.
2. Try to reason with the Naga, hoping to avoid a fight.
3. Use your knowledge of ancient spells to try to weaken the Naga.
4. Retreat and come up with a new plan to defeat the Naga.
